title.rendered: Sydney vs Melbourne, Australian T20 League 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Sydney: Josh Philippe (wk), Kurtis Patterson, James Vince, Moises Henriques (c), Jordan Silk, Daniel Christian, Hayden Kerr, Sean Abbott, Jackson Bird, Steve O’Keefe, Izharulhaq Naveed

Melbourne: Sam Harper (wk), Martin Guptill, Nic Maddinson (c), Shaun Marsh, Aaron Finch, Jonathan Wells, Akeal Hosein, Will Sutherland, Tom Rogers, David Moody, Mujeeb Ur Rahman

Pitch Report

Venue: Sydney Cricket Ground, Sydney

(Based on the last 2 games)

1st innings average score: 144

2nd innings average score: 141

Wickets per innings: 5

Type: Good for batting. Some turn for spinners.

Weather: Slightly cloudy but rain is not forecasted to play spoilsport.

Wins

Batting 1st: 50%

Batting 2nd: 50%

Fantasy Tips of the Day

Given the conditions, a spinner opened the bowling in 3 of 4 innings. Akeal Hosain, who has been bowling with the new ball, has already managed 10 wickets in a mere 4 games. He will be itching to bowl at the SCG.

Of the 21 wickets that fell in the first two games, 9 belonged to the spinners.
